children.name: imagerySet
Example - Set Bing layer imagery set

parameters.name: name `String`
parameters.description: The identifier for the imagery set. Case-insensitive.

children.description: Sets the preferred imagery set for the map.Available imagery sets:* "aerial" - Aerial imagery.* "aerialWithLabels" - Aerial imagery with a road overlay.* "road" - Roads without additional imagery.

children.name: show
children.description: Shows the layer, if not visible.

children.name: imagerySet
children.description: The default imagery set of the map.

children.name: baseUrl
children.description: The Bing API end-point.The creator of the workbook.
